definitions.definition: An open sore of the skin , eyes or mucous membrane , often caused by an initial abrasion and generally maintained by an inflammation and/or an infection .
Anything that festers and corrupts like an open sore; a vice in character.

main_definition: ( pathology ) An open sore of the skin , eyes or mucous membrane , often caused by an initial abrasion and generally maintained by an inflammation and/or an infection .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Anything that festers and corrupts like an open sore; a vice in character.
